remarks: Deduction version of ~ riotasv .  (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
riotasvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> D = ( iota_ x e. A A. y e. B ( ps -> x = C ) ) ) $.
riotasvd.2 $e |- ( ph -> D e. A ) $.
riotasvd $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. V ) -> ( ( y e. B /\ ps ) -> D = C ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ps x $.
